attributes.action: Edexcel June 2013 C3 free resit/much lower grade boundaries
attributes.additional_details:
Petition for the DoEducation to review the exam, in comparison to previous years and for the questions to be compared to examples given in the specification and in Edexcel endorsed textbooks.
Sign this petition if you think the exam should be reviewed.

rejection.details: You should discuss any concerns you have over this exam with the school – who can advise you about what happens next. You are also free to contact the Edexcel exam board directly, if you wish, to discuss your concerns further.
